title: About
text: This site will hopefully develop some degree of structure. Verdict is still out.

title: Bebop Paleo
text:
Welcome to Bebop Paleo. This site will act as my hub for storing and displaying information pertaining to my dissertation work in Paleoanthropology.
I am learning about rmarkdown (Xie et al., 2018)
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.






Map of East Asian Late Middle Pleistocene Localities (~350-70 ka). The locality names can be found in the paper linked on my About page.







The Dali skull represents a classic Archaic hominin specimen from East Asia, dating between 267-258 ka. It comes from the site of Dali represented by the number one on the map to the left. There is current debate about itâ€™s species status.









References

Xie, Y., Allaire, J.J., Grolemund, G., 2018. R markdown: The definitive guide. Chapman; Hall/CRC, Boca Raton, Florida.
